column2: Rename a Valyrian artifact owned by [Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithDynasty].
Rename a Valyrian artifact owned by [Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithDynasty].
Yes, I think I like the name [target_dummy_name.GetFullName].
Yes, I think I like the name [target_dummy_name.GetFullName].
Yes, I think I like the name [target_dummy_name.GetHornName].
A new name will be generated for §Y[target_valyrian_artifact.GetFullName]§!
Rename the armour [target_valyrian_artifact.GetFullName] worn by [From.GetTitledFirstNameWithDynasty] to [target_dummy_name.GetFullName]?
Rename the sword [target_valyrian_artifact.GetFullName] wielded by [From.GetTitledFirstNameWithDynasty] to [target_dummy_name.GetFullName]?
Rename the [target_valyrian_artifact.GetFullName] which is blown by [From.GetTitledFirstNameWithDynasty] to [target_dummy_name.GetHornName]?
[This.GetFullName] must either be a Valyrian Sword, Valyrian Armour, or a Dragon Horn
You light up some 'inspiration' and think up some names for §Y[FromFrom.GetFullName]§!
You lock yourself in your library and search for some names for §Y[FromFrom.GetFullName]§!
You visit your ancestral crypt in search of inspiration for some names for §Y[FromFrom.GetFullName]§!
You bang your head against the wall to create some names for §Y[FromFrom.GetFullName]§!
You communte with nature to seek new names for §Y[FromFrom.GetFullName]§!

VAPID auto naming is currently set to: 
Sword - [Root.GetVAPIDSword]
Armour - [Root.GetVAPIDArmour]
Horn - [Root.GetVAPIDHorn]
VAPID auto sword/armour/horn naming is currently set to [Root.GetVAPIDSword]/[Root.GetVAPIDArmour]/[Root.GetVAPIDHorn].
§YPlease note§!: You do not need to enable auto sword naming in post doom bookmarks.

Let it be known that [target_dynasty_sword_creator.GetTitledName], acting as the rightful Head of House [target_dynasty_sword_creator.GetOnlyDynastyName], and using the powers bestowed upon [target_dynasty_sword_creator.GetHerHim] by the Old Gods and the New, has declared that [target_valyrian_artifact.GetFullName] will forever more be known as the ancestral sword of House [target_dynasty_sword_creator.GetOnlyDynastyName]. In accordance with this decree, [target_valyrian_artifact.GetFullName] will be returned back to House [target_dynasty_sword_creator.GetOnlyDynastyName] upon the death of its owner wherein the rightful Head of House [target_dynasty_sword_creator.GetOnlyDynastyName] will choose only the most worthy member to wield it. All previous claims to [target_valyrian_artifact.GetFullName] are hereby nullfied. Let none challange this proclamation as doing so will be considered an act of war and House [target_dynasty_sword_creator.GetOnlyDynastyName] will be honour bound to retaliate.
None shall challange the power of House [target_dynasty_sword_creator.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
You can declare one of your valyrian swords as the ancestral sword of House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]. This will cause the sword to behave simiarlly to §KDark Sister§! and §BLady Forlorn§!.
[This.GetFullName] must be a non-canon sword and can't already be an ancestral sword of House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]
Issue an edict claiming §Y[FromFrom.GetFullName]§! as the ancestral sword of House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]. Doing this is irreversible.
Define or edit the house words used by House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
Must not already have house words
All shall know the words of House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
VAPID auto sword/armour/horn naming is currently set to [Root.GetVAPIDSword]/[Root.GetVAPIDArmour]/[Root.GetVAPIDHorn].
